title: Executive Stay in the Heart of Windhoek
description: Experience the buzz of city life in Namibia’s vibrant capital with a stay at Hilton Windhoek. Neo-Baroque cathedrals and German castles lend an air of old-world charm to this otherwise very modern city. Your stay in Windhoek includes a complimentary Executive Room upgrade with exclusive Executive Lounge Access, daily breakfast and a welcome drink on arrival. One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with breakfast included!
offer_address: Rev Michael Scott Street, Windhoek, Namibia

title: Kalahari Desert Luxury: Unique Namibia Stay with Safari Game Drive, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Live an African experience beyond your wildest dreams at Our Habitas Namibia - a secluded 51,000-hectare nature reserve in the golden Kalahari Desert. Designed with nature and total immersion in mind, this wellness sanctuary is your front-row seat to the savannah's untouched beauty and unique wildlife.

Try your luck at spotting rhinos, giraffes and zebras directly from your private terrace, or get the full guided experience on a thrilling sunrise game drive. In between exhilarating nature encounters, take advantage of the resort's wellness-focused programme, complete with unique experiences such as bush meditation, stargazing, yoga and so much more.

Continue your wellness journey with organic, locally sourced dining in an intimate setting, soak up jaw-dropping surroundings from the sun-infused pool and spend evenings by the cosy fire pit - customise your African dream any way you like.
offer_address: Farm Coas 501, Windhoek District, Namibia, South Africa

title: Contemporary Namibia City Break in the heart of Windhoek with Rooftop Restaurant and Pool
description: Revel in the urban buzz of Namibia’s capital when you stay at Avani Windhoek Hotel & Casino, where vivid city lights can be enjoyed from the rooftop restaurant, bar and pool. The onsite casino allows for high-rolling fun, while a convenient location provides walkable access to the city’s host of fascinating German-style buildings, a continuing reminder of Namibia's colonial past. After a day of sighseeing, you may like to enjoy a quick bite at The Pantry or enjoy a power session at the hotel's gym.
offer_address: Gustav Voigts Centre, 129 Independence Avenue, Windhoek, Khomas Region 9000, Namibia
